meanings.definition: Extending high in the air; towering.
meanings.sent1: The skyscraper was the loftiest building in the city.
meanings.sent2: Mount Everest is known as one of the loftiest peaks in the world.
meanings.sent3: The giraffe felt quite proud to be the loftiest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams reached the loftiest heights, aiming for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The eagle soared to the loftiest heights of the sky, feeling free.

meanings.definition: Of the highest moral or intellectual worth.
meanings.sent1: His actions were always guided by the loftiest principles.
meanings.sent2: The loftiest ideals of justice and equality were upheld by the community.
meanings.sent3: Even in the face of temptation, she remained true to her loftiest beliefs.
meanings.sent4: The loftiest thoughts of kindness and compassion filled his mind.
meanings.sent5: In times of adversity, the loftiest values shine the brightest.

meanings.sent1: Her kindness and generosity made her the loftiest person in the room.
meanings.sent2: The loftiest souls are often the most humble.
meanings.sent3: His jokes always had a loftiest touch, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: In her presence, he felt his spirits lifted to the loftiest heights.
meanings.sent5: The loftiest individuals inspire others to be their best selves.
